tool_description: Extracts and summarizes key factual elements from legal cases, including procedural posture, material facts, and case outcomes.

case_citation.description: Legal citation for the case to analyze

extraction_focus.description: Specific elements to extract: facts, procedure, holding, outcome, parties

summary_length.description: Length of extracted summaries: brief, standard, detailed

error_messages: Case not found: The specified citation does not correspond to an accessible case
Invalid extraction focus: Use valid elements [facts, procedure, holding, outcome, parties]
Invalid summary length: Choose from [brief, standard, detailed]
Case text unavailable: Full text not accessible for the specified case
Extraction failed: Unable to parse case structure for fact extraction
usage: Provide case_citation and optionally specify extraction_focus array and summary_length. Returns structured factual analysis of the case.

procedural_history.description: Case procedural posture and lower court decisions

legal_issues.description: Array of legal questions addressed by the court

key_parties.description: Names and roles of primary parties
